tag_list: davide-iuorno, popsoda-digital-solutions, ecommerce, ebusiness, market, customer-behaviour
overview:
Davide Iuorno is the founder of PopSoda Digital Solutions.

Davide has build up several web projects and now he is leveraging PopSoda Digital Solutions to be an important company in the Swiss eCommerce business and introduce to this market new options to successfully do business with changed customer behavior.
